phrs.translation: 缩短, 删节, 简化

sentences.sentence: I have to abridge my stay here.
sentences.translation: 我只得缩短在这里的逗留时间。

sentences.sentence: Book publisher may alter or abridge a work with the permission of the copyright owner.
sentences.translation: 图书出版者经版权拥有者许可，可以对作品修改或删节。

sentences.sentence: Under O. 3 r. 5 (1), the Court has power to extend or abridge the relevant time period.
sentences.translation: 高等法院第3号命令第5(1)条规则赋予法庭延展或缩短有关期限的权力。
